Articles.Content:
Tim Kerbleson

New Kerbal Tech News.

In a move which has stunned the aviation world, Kodemunkey Aerospace has unveiled a protoype aircraft unlike any seen so far. One that actually flies! I was lucky enough to have an interview with the test pilot for Kodemunkey Aerospace, Jeb "Crasher" Jebberson.

TK: So tell us, what is so unique about this particular aircraft?

JJ: Yeah, well the thing you have to remember about most aircraft is that they crash.

TK: *Nods* Anyone who has signed the waivers required to visit the facility can tell you that.

JJ: Uh, yeah (he pauses for a moment to examine his hands) The thing about this plane is...

TK: That it flies?

JJ: Yeah man, it's the craziest thing! It's really unstable though, even with the autopilot.

TK: So, i assume this aircraft has a lot of safety features?

JJ: Yeah, check it out, the engines and landing gear detach!

TK: They...what?

JJ: Yeah, like the rockets *Twitches* It also has a parachute, it's like crazy man.

TK: (muttering) not as crazy as you are.

To do list: Add flaps for the delta wings, learn how to fly. If anyone has any tips on how to improve it, please let me know. Happy crashes!
Don't have time now I'll try it later and PM you.
